forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. West southwest wind 13 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the air is filled with the unmistakable scent of an approaching evening, a prelude to the night that holds a promise of gentle chill. As we edge into the afternoon, the sun casts its warm rays, although one can feel a slight current of the west-southwest wind weaving through the streets at about 23 mph, stirring the leaves and perhaps tugging at your jacket. The temperatures hover close to 63, beckoning those dressed in layers to discover the cozy embrace of the city's heart— a walk on the Embarcadero, or perhaps a visit to one of the local cafés where one can sip on a warm brew and watch the world drift by.

As twilight descends, expect a subtle shift; the clouds will begin to blanket the sky, offering a slight chance for drizzle to spritz the landscape after 11 PM. The coolness will draw in closer as the low hits around 55 degrees, prompting you to don a light sweater or jacket. There might be a hint of the marine layer, a delicate veil that dances on the outskirts of the Golden Gate, teasing the edges of the skyline. While the evening may start with some retreating sun, finding solace in the city's rhythm could lead to moments spent at a gallery opening or perhaps an evening stroll near the waterfront where the lights flicker in the water, lending a serene beauty to your night.
